question: On the MLA mailing list, one asked the following question: _"A professor at my university asked me today if I could find any music for flute and TWO bassoons – an interesting combo, to be sure"_  - [source](https://list.indiana.edu/sympa/arc/mla-l/2017-08/msg00248.html) <a name="works-expressions"/>

On the MLA mailing list, one asked the following question: _"A professor at my university asked me today if I could find any music for flute and TWO bassoons – an interesting combo, to be sure"_  - [source](https://list.indiana.edu/sympa/arc/mla-l/2017-08/msg00248.html) <a name="works-expressions"/> (Strict version)
Which works have been composed by Mozart ?
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Which works have been composed by Mozart?
# [fr] Quelles oeuvres ont été composées par Mozart ?

SELECT DISTINCT ?expression SAMPLE(?title) as ?title
WHERE {
  ?expression a efrbroo:F22_Self-Contained_Expression ;
          rdfs:label ?title .
  ?expCreation efrbroo:R17_created ?expression ;
          ecrm:P9_consists_of / ecrm:P14_carried_out_by ?composer .
  ?composer foaf:name "Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart"
} ORDER BY ?title

question: Which works have been composed in 1836 ?
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Which works have been composed in 1836 ?
# [fr] Quelles oeuvres ont été composées en 1836 ?


SELECT DISTINCT ?expression, sql:BEST_LANGMATCH(?title, 'en, en-gb;q=0.8, fr=0.6; *;q=0.1', 'en') as ?title, ?start, ?end
FROM <http://data.doremus.org/philharmonie>
WHERE {
  ?expression a efrbroo:F22_Self-Contained_Expression ;
          rdfs:label ?title .

  ?expCreation efrbroo:R17_created ?expression ;
          ecrm:P4_has_time-span ?ts.
  ?ts time:hasEnd / time:inXSDDate ?end ;
      time:hasBeginning / time:inXSDDate ?start .

  FILTER ( ?start <= "1836"^^xsd:gYear AND ?end >= "1836"^^xsd:gYear )
}
ORDER BY ?start


# note: I restricted the query to 1 graph (http://data.doremus.org/philharmonie) because it is very slow.
# Comment the FROM for the full answer

question: Which works have been written for string quartet?
What works are linked to a particular work and what type of link connect them?
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] What works are linked to a particular work and what type of link connect them?
# [fr] Quelles oeuvres sont reliées à telle oeuvre et quel type de lien les unissent ?

SELECT DISTINCT ?expression, ?link, ?expression2
WHERE {
  ?expression a efrbroo:F22_Self-Contained_Expression .
  ?expression2 a efrbroo:F22_Self-Contained_Expression .

  ?work mus:U38_has_descriptive_expression | efrbroo:R9_is_realised_in ?expression .
  ?work2 mus:U38_has_descriptive_expression | efrbroo:R9_is_realised_in ?expression2 .

  { ?work ?link ?work2 } UNION { ?expression ?link ?expression }

  FILTER (?expression != ?expression2)
}
LIMIT 500

question: Retrieve all the works that have been written by German composers between 1800 and 1850 and performed at the Royal Albert Hall
Give me the flute sonatas that last less than or equal to 15 minutes
Give me all the sonatas for piano and violin whose duration is between 20 and 30 minutes
Give me the works written for oboe and orchestra after the 1900
Give me the works written for violin, clarinet and piano (strictly)
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me the works written for violin, clarinet and piano (strictly)
# [fr] Donne-moi les oeuvres écrites pour violon, clarinette et piano (strictement)


SELECT DISTINCT ?expression, SAMPLE(?title) as ?title, ?casting
WHERE {
  ?expression a efrbroo:F22_Self-Contained_Expression ;
          rdfs:label ?title ;
          mus:U13_has_casting ?casting .

  ?casting mus:U23_has_casting_detail ?allCastingDets .

  ?casting mus:U23_has_casting_detail ?castingDet1 .
  ?castingDet1 mus:U2_foresees_use_of_medium_of_performance ?violin .

  ?casting mus:U23_has_casting_detail ?castingDet2 .
  ?castingDet2 mus:U2_foresees_use_of_medium_of_performance ?clarinet.

  ?casting mus:U23_has_casting_detail ?castingDet3 .
  ?castingDet3 mus:U2_foresees_use_of_medium_of_performance  ?piano .

  VALUES (?violin) { ( <http://data.doremus.org/vocabulary/iaml/mop/svl> ) (<http://www.mimo-db.eu/InstrumentsKeywords/3573>) }
  VALUES (?clarinet) { (<http://data.doremus.org/vocabulary/iaml/mop/wcl>) (<http://www.mimo-db.eu/InstrumentsKeywords/3836>) }
  VALUES (?piano) { (<http://data.doremus.org/vocabulary/iaml/mop/kpf>) (<http://www.mimo-db.eu/InstrumentsKeywords/2299>) }
}
GROUP BY ?expression ?casting
HAVING (COUNT(?allCastingDets) = 3)

question: Give me the works of chamber music that involves at least violin, clarinet and piano
Give me the works of chamber music that involves at most violin, clarinet and piano
Give me the works of chamber music that involves at most violin, clarinet and piano, except from the sonatas for violin and piano and clarinet and piano
Give me all the melodies written on French texts for average voice between 1870 and 1913.
Give me all the slow movements of chamber music that foresee at least one cello
Give me all the sacred vocal music for choir written in England since 1945
Give me all the operas of which the composer is also the librettist
Give me all works for which there are alternate castings with different interpreters (e.g. keyboard & orch / cello, oboe & orch)
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me all works for which there are alternate castings with a different number of interpreters (e.g. keyboard & orch / cello, oboe & orch)
# [fr] Donne-moi toutes les oeuvres pour lesquelles il existe des castings alternatifs ayant un nombre d’interprètes différent (p.ex. clavier & orch / vl, hb & orch)

SELECT DISTINCT ?expression, SAMPLE(?title) AS ?title, ?casting1, count(DISTINCT ?cDet1) AS ?n1, ?casting2, count(DISTINCT ?cDet2) as ?n2
WHERE {
  ?expression a efrbroo:F22_Self-Contained_Expression ;
          rdfs:label ?title ;
          mus:U13_has_casting ?casting1, ?casting2 .
  
  ?casting1 mus:U23_has_casting_detail ?cDet1 .
  
  ?casting2 mus:U23_has_casting_detail ?cDet2 .
  
  FILTER ( ?casting1 != ?casting2 )
}
GROUP BY ?expression ?casting1 ?casting2
HAVING (count(?cDet1) != count(?cDet2))

# Note: not currently in the data. See https://github.com/DOREMUS-ANR/marc2rdf/issues/22

question: Give me all the works for which there are alternative castings with a different number of instruments (e.g. 2 pianos or 4 hands piano)
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me all the works for which there are alternative castings with a different number of instruments (e.g. 2 pianos or 4 hands piano)
# [fr] Donne-moi toutes les oeuvres pour lesquelles il existe des castings alternatifs ayant un nombre d’instruments différent (p.ex. 2 pianos ou piano 4 mains)

SELECT DISTINCT ?expression, ?casting1, SUM(?nI1) AS ?n1, ?casting2, count(?nI2) as ?n2
WHERE {
  ?expression a efrbroo:F22_Self-Contained_Expression ;
          mus:U13_has_casting ?casting1, ?casting2 .
  
  ?casting1 mus:U23_has_casting_detail / mus:U30_foresees_quantity_of_mop ?nI1 .
  
  ?casting2 mus:U23_has_casting_detail / mus:U30_foresees_quantity_of_mop ?nI2 .
  
  FILTER ( ?casting1 != ?casting2 )
}
GROUP BY ?expression ?casting1 ?casting2
HAVING (count(?nI1) != count(?nI2))

# Note: not currently in the data. See https://github.com/DOREMUS-ANR/marc2rdf/issues/22

question: Give me a list of melodies of 20th century about gastronomy
Give me a list of works of chamber music composed in the 19th century by Scandinavian composers
Give me the list of the works of which at least one of the dedicatees is also a performer of the work
Give me the list of the reductions of works of Wagner realized in the 20th century
Give me the list of all symphonies that include 5 movements
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me the list of all symphonies that include 5 movements
# [fr] Donne moi la liste de toutes les symphonies qui comprennent 5 mouvements

SELECT DISTINCT ?work, SAMPLE(?title) as ?title
WHERE {
  ?work a efrbroo:F14_Individual_Work;
        ecrm:P148_has_component ?movements;
        efrbroo:R9_is_realised_in ?expression.
  
  ?expression rdfs:label ?title ;
            mus:U12_has_genre <http://data.doremus.org/vocabulary/iaml/genre/sy> .

} GROUP BY ?work
HAVING ( COUNT(DISTINCT ?movements) >= 5 )
LIMIT 500

# Note: they are not exactly movements

question: Give me the list of works composed by Mozart in the last 5 years of his life
Give me a cycle of melodies whose author of text is the same for each melody
Give me a list of works composed between 1860 and 1880, for small formation (maximum 6 instrumentalists) including 1 piano
Give me the list of works of J.S. Bach between BWV 30 and BWV 70
Give me all the works for piano connected to other musical works
Give me all works for piano based on works of Schubert
Give me all the works related to an extra-musical artistic field
Give me all the works related to popular music <!-- END Works and Expressions --> <a name="artists"/>
Retrieve the works by artists that have been mutually lovers
Give me the name and the birth date of artists that played the oboe
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me the name and the birth date of artists that played the oboe
# [fr] donne-moi les noms et date de naissance des artistes qui jouent du hautbois

SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name ?birthDate
WHERE {
  ?performance ecrm:P9_consists_of ?part .

  ?part ecrm:P14_carried_out_by ?artist ;
      mus:U1_used_medium_of_performance / skos:exactMatch* <http://www.mimo-db.eu/InstrumentsKeywords/4232> .

  ?artist rdfs:label ?name .
  OPTIONAL { ?artist schema:birthDate ?birthDate }
} ORDER BY ?artist

question: Give me the list of musicians of the Radio France Philharmonic Orchestra having a chamber music activity in concerts organized by Radio France <!-- END Artists --> <a name="performances"/>
Give me all the works with an alternative distribution
Give me all the performances in which a composer interprets his or her works
Give me all the performances in which a composer directs one of his works
Give me the list of concerts of the Orchestre National de France in which the conductor is also instrumental soloist (in the same concert)
Give me the list of concerts given at the Philharmonie de Paris in which the orchestra is directed by the solo violin
Give me the list of concerts performed at the Abbaye aux Dames de Saintes outside the festival period of Saintes
Give me the list of the works that were created where they were composed
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me the list of the works that were created where they were composed
# [fr] Donne moi la liste des oeuvres qui ont été créées là où elles ont été composées

SELECT DISTINCT ?expression, SAMPLE(?title) as ?title, ?place
WHERE {
  ?expression a efrbroo:F22_Self-Contained_Expression ;
          rdfs:label ?title .

  ?expCreation efrbroo:R17_created ?expression ;
          ecrm:P7_took_place_at ?place .

  ?work efrbroo:R9_is_realised_in ?expression;
        mus:U5_had_premiere / ecrm:P7_took_place_at ?place .
}
LIMIT 500

# Note: we have not the composition places

question: Give me all the works for which the title of the Performed Expression is different from the title of the work
Give me all the works interpreted on at least one mop different from the casting of the work <!-- END Performances --> <a name="recordings"/>
Give me the artists that have been recorded more than 10 times by Radio France
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me the artists that have been recorded more than 10 times by Radio France
# [fr] Donne-moi les artistes qui ont été enregistrés plus de 10 fois par Radio France


SELECT DISTINCT ?artist SAMPLE(?artistName) as ?name COUNT(DISTINCT ?rec) as ?recording_num
WHERE {
 ?rec  a efrbroo:F29_Recording_Event ;
       ecrm:P9_consists_of / ecrm:P14_carried_out_by <http://data.doremus.org/organization/Radio_France> ;
       efrbroo:R20_recorded ?performance .

 ?performance ecrm:P9_consists_of* / ecrm:P14_carried_out_by ?artist .

 ?artist foaf:name ?artistName
} GROUP BY ?artist
HAVING (COUNT(DISTINCT ?rec) > 10)
LIMIT 100

question: Give me the list of the choristers of the Collegium Vocale who participated in at least three radio recordings of the choir in 2012
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me the list of the choristers of the Collegium Vocale who participated in at least three radio recordings of the choir in 2012
# [fr] Donne-moi la liste des choristes du Collegium Vocale ayant participé à au moins trois enregistrements radio du choeur en 2012

SELECT DISTINCT ?chorister COUNT(DISTINCT ?rec) as ?recording_num
WHERE {
 ?rec  a efrbroo:F29_Recording_Event ;
       efrbroo:R20_recorded ?performance .

 ?performance ecrm:P9_consists_of* / ecrm:P14_carried_out_by ?chorister ;
 ecrm:P4_has_time-span / time:hasBeginning / time:inXSDDate ?time .

 <http://data.doremus.org/artist/4ea0ad13-01a4-3d0d-a206-5dabffba91e6> ecrm:P107_has_current_or_former_member ?chorister

 FILTER ( year(?time) = 2012 )

} GROUP BY ?chorister
HAVING (COUNT(DISTINCT ?rec) > 3)

question: Give me the name of the vocal soloist most recorded by Radio France in 2014
Give me the list of all the concerts recorded by Radio France at the Cité de la Musique between 1995 and 2014

Give me the list of concerts recorded by Radio France at the auditorium of the Cité de la Musique in which were used one or several French harpsichords of the 17th century belonging to the Musée de la Musique
Give me the list of the recordings made in 2014 by Harmonia Mundi with French musical ensembles, using at least one Urtext score
Give me all the registration free of rights
Give me the cutting of all the recordings of Don Giovanni by Mozart
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me the cutting of all the recordings of Don Giovanni by Mozart
# [fr] Donne moi le découpage de tous les enregistrements de Don Giovanni de Mozart

SELECT DISTINCT ?trackset ?track
WHERE {
  ?trackset efrbroo:R5_has_component ?track .
  ?track a mus:M24_Track ;
        mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of / mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of	?work .

  ?work rdfs:label ?title.

  ?expCreation efrbroo:R17_created ?work ;
          ecrm:P9_consists_of / ecrm:P14_carried_out_by <http://data.doremus.org/artist/4802a043-23bb-3b8d-a443-4a3bd22ccc63> .

  FILTER (contains(str(?title), "Don Giovanni"))
}

question: Give me all the recordings of the _Catalogue Aria_ (isolated air or in a recording of the opera) <!-- END Recordings --> <a name="publications"/>
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me all the recordings of the _Catalogue Aria_ (isolated air or in a recording of the opera)
# [fr] Donne moi tous les enregistrements de l'_Air du catalogue_ (air isolé ou dans un enregistrement de l’opéra)

SELECT DISTINCT ?rec
WHERE {
  ?rec mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of ?perf.

  ?perf rdfs:label ?label ;
         mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of	?work .

  ?work rdfs:label ?title.

  ?expCreation efrbroo:R17_created ?work ;
          ecrm:P9_consists_of / ecrm:P14_carried_out_by <http://data.doremus.org/artist/4802a043-23bb-3b8d-a443-4a3bd22ccc63> .

  FILTER (contains(str(?label), "Air du catalogue"))
  FILTER (contains(str(?title), "Don Giovanni"))
}

# Note: Catalogue Aria is contained in Don Giovanni

question: Among concerts and CDs, which works are often played after < other work > ?
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Among concerts and CDs, which works are often played after < other work > ?
# [fr] Dans les concerts et les cd, quelles oeuvres sont souvent jouées après < telle autre oeuvre > ?

SELECT DISTINCT ?work2 SAMPLE(?title) as ?title (COUNT(distinct ?t2)) as ?num_times SAMPLE(?t2) as ?example_track
WHERE {
  ?trackset efrbroo:R5_has_component ?t1, ?t2 .

  ?t1 mus:U10_has_order_number ?on1 ;
      mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of / mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of ?work1.

  ?t2 mus:U10_has_order_number ?on2 ;
      mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of / mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of ?work2.

  ?work2 rdfs:label ?title .

  VALUES ?work1 { <http://data.doremus.org/expression/d72301f0-0aba-3ba6-93e5-c4efbee9c6ea> }
  FILTER (?work1 != ?work2)
  FILTER (?on2 = (?on1 + 1))
}
GROUP BY ?work2
ORDER BY DESC (COUNT(distinct ?t2))
LIMIT 100

question: Give me pairs of recorded tracks that are composed with the same key
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me pairs of recorded tracks that are composed with the same key
# [fr] donne-moi des paires de titres enregistrés qui sont composés dans la même tonalité

SELECT DISTINCT ?work1 SAMPLE(?title1) as ?title1 ?work2 SAMPLE(?title2) as ?title2 ?key
WHERE {
  ?trackset efrbroo:R5_has_component ?t1, ?t2 .

  ?t1 mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of / mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of ?work1.
  ?t2 mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of / mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of ?work2.

  ?work1 rdfs:label ?title1 ; mus:U11_has_key ?key .
  ?work2 rdfs:label ?title2 ; mus:U11_has_key ?key .

  FILTER (?work1 != ?work2)
} LIMIT 100

question: Give me the list of the latest releases of DGG (Deutsche Grammophon Gesellschaft) in chamber music for strings
Give me all the recordings of opera aria whose library has at least one score
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me all the recordings of opera aria whose library has at least one score
# [fr] Donne moi tous les enregistrements d’airs d’opéra dont la bibliothèque dispose d’au moins une partition

SELECT DISTINCT ?t ?work
WHERE {
  ?t mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of / mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of ?work.
  ?work mus:U12_has_genre <http://data.doremus.org/vocabulary/iaml/genre/op> .

  ?score ecrm:P2_has_type "score";
      ecrm:P128_carries ?work .
} LIMIT 100

question: Give me all the recordings of opera aria whose library has no score <!-- END Publications -->
query:
PREFIX mus: <http://data.doremus.org/ontology#>
PREFIX ecrm: <http://erlangen-crm.org/current/>
PREFIX efrbroo: <http://erlangen-crm.org/efrbroo/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

# [en] Give me all the recordings of opera aria whose library has no score
# [fr] Donne moi tous les enregistrements d’airs d’opéra dont la bibliothèque ne dispose d’aucune partition  

SELECT DISTINCT ?t ?work
WHERE {
  ?t mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of / mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of ?work.
  ?work mus:U12_has_genre <http://data.doremus.org/vocabulary/iaml/genre/op> .

  ?score ecrm:P2_has_type "score".

  FILTER
    NOT EXISTS {?score ecrm:P128_carries ?work }
} LIMIT 100
